articles.title: Researchers Describe Possible Mechanism for Distorted Cognition in SLE - AJMC.com Managed Markets Network
articles.description: The issue of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) is particularly important in Asia, because patients there suffer from more severe disease and damage compared with patients in Western countries.
articles.content:
A recent study out of Singapore described findings that may explain how cognitive dysfunction occurs in systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE).

articles.title: Why cancer stigma for Asian Americans is so dangerous - NBC News
articles.description: Why cancer stigma for Asian Americans is so dangerous -- especially in the age of Covid-19 and coronavirus
articles.content:
My husband and I were doing what married couples do in bed after a romantic anniversary dinner. An odd look suddenly crossed his face.
Whats wrong? I asked.
